question: Economic Survey in India is published officially, every year by which of the following authorities?
option3: Ministry of Finance, Government of India
option4: Ministry of Industries, Government of India
answer: Ministry of Finance, Government of India
explanation: The Department of Economic Affairs, Finance Ministry of India presents the Economic Survey in the parliament every year, just before the Union Budget. It is prepared under the guidance of the Chief Economic Adviser, Finance Ministry. It is the ministry\'s view on the annual economic development of the country.
